Text: Download will be spotty for a couple days as my ISP seems to be throttling my bittorrent traffic. Hang in there and you'll get it.
Hi, do you know if I can unlock it to HomePremium by deleting ei.cfg? will it still activate after that? Would appreciate if you can upload only the $oem$ folder, so that I can try further. Thanks.

There are no cracks or activators on this torrent. This is an exact OEM copy. So, a key will be required if you don't have a Dell PC with SLIC 2.1 BIOS. You can google to find a SLIC 2.1 bios for your dell. Other brands will have to have the XRM-MS license and OEM product key to activate.

As for turning this into Home Premium, I have no idea. I can't say I've tried it.
